tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: LOOK ME IN THE EYES
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: and tell me you don't dig it. Subscribe for new vid in 4 days and don't forget to comment and let me know if you crumble under the pressure of eye contact. Keep up to date with Twitter: www.twitter.com or Facebook: www.facebook.com Hope you're all well and having a wonderful weekend and that you have a great start to the week. x

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: ASSASSIN'S﻿ CREED SHIRT!!!!!!
I thumbed ya﻿ :)
Is it just me or is this﻿ a thinly veiled expression of multiple personality disorder, nat talking to herself and using youtube to normalise this affliction??
OMGOMG﻿ she called me SUPERCOOL!! :D
can you﻿ make a lesbian porno seeming how there's always two girls in your videos..you would get more views.
very funny ladies,﻿ well done :)
When people lie they tend to quickly﻿ glance to the left. That's why.
omg were is nat 2:20 they all﻿ look the same D:
haha, thats﻿ how good she is at split screening! :D
I love how Nat is an﻿ assassin's creed fan. This is a good thing!
Someone once tried to look me in the eyes, they died after 10 days of extreme﻿ pain
I would watch a soap with Nat playing all the﻿ characters...
don't forget to thumb me lolwot. ﻿
we will﻿ spit roast her.
Actually,﻿ when people are being deceptive, their pupils dilate.
Super﻿ cool :)
Give me﻿ your shirt. NOW!

i remember twice i looked at my friend for like 15 secs and they broke under my gaze. ex) friend and i were walking heard weird noise like a clap, i assumed my friend's sandle tripped into a crack on the sidewalk﻿ but i didnt see any. I asked her did you just trip? and she rofled she tooted :)
Yes Nat, I'm Super﻿ Cool Like You ...Everyone Is (: Well Almost
I love your﻿ soap opera scene :D
natalie﻿ is a milf. ill fawk and eat her pussy

Reviewer.Music: Paramore, Avril Lavigne, Tatu, Hilary Duff, New found Glory etc.

Reviewer.Books: twilight series mouse on the motorcycle monster star wars redemption
Reviewer.Movies: the Last samurai AVATAR i enjoy Gundam, Dragon ball Z ,Avatar the last airbender, inuyasha and a few other anime.
